relevant_communication:
Aston Martin Lagonda is a member of the European Small Volume Car Alliance (ESCA), the representative body for automotive manufacturers producing less than 10,000 units per year as recognised under EU legislation.  
http://www.esca-online.eu/
goals__remit: Aston Martin Lagonda is a UK-based luxury car group with more than 100 years of design and automotive excellence across two brands.
